content.body: Workshop on Programming Language Standardization and Specification (PLSS @ECOOP 2025): https://2025.ecoop.org/home/plss-2025#Call-for-Presentations . Keynote will be given by Andreas Rossberg on [WebAssembly SpecTec](https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3656440)
